ack.p: Some of the data used in this study were collected with the support of Institut Paul Emile Victor (IPEV Program 109) and Terres Australes et Antarctiques Françaises. We thank these organizations and all the fieldworkers involved in the collection of data in the Kerguelen archipelago. The MarCPFS DataBase was kindly developped by Roger Boll. We would like to warmly thank Dr Céline Feillet for reviewing the English and anonymous reviewers who provided helpful suggestions and constructive comments. The simulation code was developped in C-ANSI and built thanks to the open sources cross-platform IDE CodeBlocks (13.12) and the Gnu Compiler gcc 4.8.2.
